bibl.title: Ptolemaic mummy stuffings, 3: the documentary texts (Beinecke P.CtYBR inv. 5058,5059, 5060, 5061, 5062, 5063)
bibl.seg: William A. Johnson, Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings, 3: The Documentary Texts (Beinecke P.CtYBR inv. 5058, 5059, 5060, 5061, 5062, 5063).

Suite de: William A. Johnson, Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings, 2: a Comic Fragment and Grammatical Text in the Yale Collection (P.CtYBR inv. 5019, 5043), ZPE 199 (2016) pp. 7-15, 2 figg. - Edition of six papyri acquired in 1998: P. Yale Inv. 5058. Petition (legal complaint). Herakleopolite, c. 185-125 BC; - Inv. 5059. Petition (legal complaint). Herakleopolite, late 3rd / early 2nd BC; - Inv. 5060. Petition (?). Provenance unknown, late 3rd / early 2nd B.C.; - Inv. 5061. Official correspondence. Provenance unknown, late 3rd / early 2nd BC; - Inv. 5062. Petition to travel. Herakleopolite-Ankyropolis (?), late 3rd / early 2nd BC; - Inv. 5063. Official correspondence. Arsinoite nome (?), 209 or 192 B.C.
